text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
Whereas, the Recording Machine Test Committee of the AssoÂ¬
ciation has worked diligently in preparing the first scientific
comprehensive report on qualities of instantaneous recording
machines available on the market, and whereas, A. James Ebel,
Chief Engineer of WILL, has been instrumental in doing the major
portion of the committee work.
Therefore, be it resolved that the National Association
of Educational Broadcasters does hereby express its appreciation
of the work done by him and commends the results attained.
(Adopted September 2, 1939)
